TopicTitle: Youtubers, Assemble? A silly idea for DarkMultiplayer.

Articles.Content:
Two DMP-promoting videos in as many days. First HOCGaming:

And then EnterElysium, playing in the same game but from a different perspective:

And that got me wondering. Just how feasible, and fun, would it be to have a Youtuber DMP Special of some sorts? As many of the usual suspects as can be coerced persuaded into taking part, all on the same server instance. A Youtube Space Station only without the .sfs-swapping. Scott Manley about to kick the Un-named Descendant of Zardoz into orbit when all of a sudden, a wild Danny2462 appears. Right up the tailpipe. At Mach 10.

And all the while, the KSP-TVers streaming it live and trying not to fall over laughing.

Or maybe I'm just being silly. What do you think?
*puts on horse mask* i love it! Honestly sounds great, might be another idea for a charity stream.
HOC, Elysium and Chickenkeeper are going to do a DMP Series.

HOC, Elysium and Chickenkeeper are going to do a DMP Series.

Indeed they are, as mentioned in the videos above. I was thinking something a bit more one-off (or maybe a few-off) and large-scale. A real stress-test of the mod as it were, plus having so many different KSP video makers with their own styles all in the same game at once has got to make for some hilarity.

Also I'm gonna move the thread into Mission Control after a quick chat with Diomedea. It probably belongs there.

Yessssss. So much yesssssssssss.

If Danny joined the HOC/Elysium/Chickenkeeper trio in the series, now THAT would be a REAL DMP stress test, Danny style.
I would be up for this. It sounds like fun:cool:

This is relevant, concerns DMP development:

DarkMultiPlayer Announcement: http://youtu.be/b7Px5YObsA4

If Danny joined the HOC/Elysium/Chickenkeeper trio in the series, now THAT would be a REAL DMP stress test, Danny style.

*Rocks back and forth. Rocks back and forth*
